segments.text: I see the girl looking up at the boy, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, like she doesn’t realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out, and the floor is getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall—it’s going to be a big mess if he does.
segments.speaker: PAR
